thread.title: McCabe kept notes on interactions with Trump - source

title: McCabe kept notes on interactions with Trump - source
text:
McCabe kept notes on interactions with Trump - source 7:13pm GMT - 01:51 
Andrew McCabe, the former deputy director at the Federal Bureau of Investigation fired by U.S. Attorney General Jeff Sessions on Friday, kept detailed notes about his interactions with President Donald Trump, according to a source familiar with the matter. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Andrew McCabe, the former deputy director at the Federal Bureau of Investigation fired by U.S. Attorney General Jeff Sessions on Friday, kept detailed notes about his interactions with President Donald Trump, according to a source familiar with the matter.
